meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>region</kanji> that is this <kanji>ground</kanji> is the <vocabulary>region</vocabulary> / <vocabulary>area</vocabulary>. Just think of each area of ground. Each area is each region.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
